Published January 6 2015

Wherein I'm reminded of my love for chess

Wherein I'm reminded of my love for chess — Deep Green Chess, by Cocoa Stuff, is my favorite chess app for iOS. This week, the long-awaited refreshed UI was released, and it’s just great. There are little details everywhere, which help take my mind off of getting demoralized by Deep Green’s AI.

Enjoy your day.
